title: Pixel XL unable to unlock from pattern after upgrade to Android 9
content:
Just shifted to a Google Pixel XL from an iphone and one week later hells breaking loose.
Initial problem: Cant unlock the phone via Pattern- Tried unlocking many times but does not work. It recolonizes if a wrong pattern is input but wont unlock on the right pattern. 
Restarted the phone - It does not  work DUH.. the phone needs the pattern compulsorily after a restart and that was the problem. 
Now panicking -  tried a factory reset - THis does not work
Tried locking device and erasing device - does not work.

PS: bought 2 devices and problem started 12 hours ago for both the devices together.
